name: Assault Mastery I
description: Eliminate 10 enemies using an AR rifle to complete the mission. Focus on precision and timing for quick success.

rewards.title: AR Beginner
rewards.extra: Bonus BP or AR weapon skin

tipsTricks.heading: Select AR Rifles for Versatility
tipsTricks.description: Choose balanced AR rifles like the M416 or SCAR-L to handle both close and mid-range combat effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Land in Medium-Traffic Zones
tipsTricks.description: Drop in areas with moderate player traffic to find AR rifles quickly and engage enemies without overwhelming numbers.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Unranked Mode (Optional for Rating Protection)
tipsTricks.description: Opt for Unranked Mode to focus on the mission without affecting your rank, allowing you to play with less pressure.

requirements.heading: Eliminate 10 Enemies with AR Rifle
requirements.description: Achieve 10 eliminations using any AR rifle. Aim for accuracy and stay mobile to gain an advantage.

requirements.heading: Equip Attachments for Stability
requirements.description: Use attachments like vertical grips and compensators to minimize recoil and improve shooting precision.

name: Battlefield Scalpel
description: Master the art of long-range combat by completing challenging tasks with bolt-action sniper rifles. Showcase precision and skill to dominate the battleground.

rewards.title: Sniper Specialist Title
rewards.extra: Exclusive sniper rifle skin upon completion

tipsTricks.heading: Position Yourself Strategically
tipsTricks.description: Find high ground or concealed areas with a clear line of sight to spot enemies at long distances effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Adjust for Bullet Drop
tipsTricks.description: Bolt-action rifles are affected by bullet drop. Aim slightly above your target for long-range shots to ensure accuracy.

tipsTricks.heading: Aim for Moving Targets
tipsTricks.description: To eliminate a fast-moving enemy (40km/h or faster), aim ahead of their movement direction to compensate for travel time.

tipsTricks.heading: Fully Attach Your Rifle
tipsTricks.description: Equip each bolt-action sniper with full attachments for better stability, reduced recoil, and improved performance.

requirements.heading: Eliminate an Enemy at 300m+ in Ranked Platinum
requirements.description: Use a bolt-action sniper to eliminate an enemy from over 300 meters while in Platinum tier or higher in a ranked match.

requirements.heading: Eliminate a Fast-Moving Enemy
requirements.description: Eliminate an enemy moving at 40km/h or faster with a bolt-action sniper rifle in Platinum tier or higher in a ranked match.

requirements.heading: Deal 500 Damage in a Single Match
requirements.description: Achieve a total of at least 500 damage with a bolt-action sniper rifle in a single match.

requirements.heading: Equip Kar98K with Full Attachments
requirements.description: Find a Kar98K and equip it with a scope, extended magazine, cheek pad, and suppressor.

requirements.heading: Equip Mosin-Nagant with Full Attachments
requirements.description: Find a Mosin-Nagant and fully equip it with appropriate attachments.

requirements.heading: Equip M24 with Full Attachments
requirements.description: Locate an M24 and equip it with a scope, extended magazine, cheek pad, and suppressor.

requirements.heading: Equip AWM with Full Attachments
requirements.description: Secure an AWM and attach all available accessories for maximum performance.

name: Center Of Attention V
description: Earn 600 likes to prove your popularity and positive impact on your PUBG teammates.

tipsTricks.heading: Play as a Team Player
tipsTricks.description: Focus on reviving teammates, sharing resources, and providing support to earn likes from your squad.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in High-Impact Plays
tipsTricks.description: Execute impressive kills, clutch plays, or provide critical support during intense battles to earn likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Communicate Effectively
tipsTricks.description: Use voice or text chat to guide your team, provide callouts, and create a friendly environment to increase your chances of receiving likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Classic Mode
tipsTricks.description: Classic mode matches are longer and provide more opportunities to make a positive impression on your team.

requirements.heading: Earn 600 Likes
requirements.description: Accumulate a total of 600 likes by playing matches and impressing teammates with your skills and teamwork.

name: Center Of Attention IV
description: Earn 300 likes to showcase your impact and popularity within PUBG matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Be a Good Teammate
tipsTricks.description: Help teammates by reviving, sharing supplies, and staying active in teamwork to earn their likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Supportive Roles
tipsTricks.description: Play roles like sniper or scout and contribute effectively to team success to gain likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Showcase High-Skill Plays
tipsTricks.description: Perform clutch moments or high-level eliminations to impress your team and encourage likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage in Voice Chat
tipsTricks.description: Communicate with your team using voice chat to create a positive and coordinated environment.

requirements.heading: Earn 300 Likes
requirements.description: Gain a total of 300 likes by being a supportive and effective teammate across matches.

name: Center Of Attention III
description: Earn 120 likes by making a positive impact on your team and showcasing excellent gameplay.

rewards.title: Rising Star
rewards.extra: Exclusive player tag to showcase your popularity

tipsTricks.heading: Team Up with Skilled Players
tipsTricks.description: Form teams with experienced players who can help you earn likes by performing well together.

tipsTricks.heading: Take the Lead in Eliminations
tipsTricks.description: Lead your team by securing high-value eliminations and contributing significantly to victories.

tipsTricks.heading: Keep Up Team Morale
tipsTricks.description: Be an encouraging presence and keep your team motivated, leading to more likes from your teammates.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Active Throughout the Match
tipsTricks.description: Engage in every phase of the game, whether it's scouting, supporting, or securing eliminations.

requirements.heading: Earn 120 Likes
requirements.description: Complete matches and earn a total of 120 likes by showcasing teamwork and skill.

name: Center Of Attention II
description: Earn 60 likes by playing well and contributing positively to your team during matches.

rewards.title: Team Player
rewards.extra: A special player badge to show your support and cooperation

tipsTricks.heading: Be a Supportive Teammate
tipsTricks.description: Help your team by providing cover, reviving teammates, and sharing resources.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Consistent
tipsTricks.description: Maintain a steady performance and remain active throughout the match to earn likes.

tipsTricks.heading: Play with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Cooperate with your friends in a squad, as it is easier to earn likes by working together.

requirements.heading: Earn 60 Likes
requirements.description: Earn a total of 60 likes from your teammates by contributing to the team's success.

name: Center Of Attention I
description: Earn 30 likes by supporting your teammates and playing positively in matches.

rewards.title: Helpful Teammate
rewards.extra: A badge to highlight your cooperation and team spirit

tipsTricks.heading: Play Supportive Roles
tipsTricks.description: Opt for roles like medic or support, where you can actively help and revive teammates.

tipsTricks.heading: Engage Actively in Matches
tipsTricks.description: Stay involved by staying near teammates and helping them during fights or challenges.

tipsTricks.heading: Good Communication
tipsTricks.description: Use voice chat or pings to communicate strategies and needs with your teammates.

requirements.heading: Earn 30 Likes
requirements.description: You need to earn a total of 30 likes through positive actions in a match.

name: Brothers in Arms V
description: Complete 1000 matches while in a group with friends.

rewards.title: Ultimate Team Player
rewards.extra: Exclusive badge for completing a high number of matches with friends.

tipsTricks.heading: Play Regularly with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Ensure you're in a group of friends before starting each match to make progress toward the mission.

tipsTricks.heading: Coordinate with Your Team
tipsTricks.description: Strategize with your team for better coordination and to enjoy matches more effectively.

tipsTricks.heading: Utilize Voice Chat
tipsTricks.description: Use voice chat to stay connected and communicate during matches for optimal team performance.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in a Fixed Group
tipsTricks.description: To maximize your chances of completing the mission, play with the same group of friends regularly.

requirements.heading: Complete 1000 Matches with Friends
requirements.description: You need to play and complete 1000 matches with friends to unlock this mission.

name: Brothers in Arms IV
description: Complete 250 matches while in a group with friends.

rewards.title: Dedicated Teammate
rewards.extra: Earn an exclusive badge that showcases your dedication to playing with friends.

tipsTricks.heading: Play with Consistent Friends
tipsTricks.description: Regularly playing with the same group of friends can help complete the mission faster and foster better teamwork.

tipsTricks.heading: Use the Group Finder
tipsTricks.description: If you don't have enough friends to play with, use PUBG's group finder to team up with others and complete matches together.

tipsTricks.heading: Focus on Completing Matches
tipsTricks.description: Make sure to complete the matches with your team, not just start them, in order to count toward the mission progress.

requirements.heading: Complete 250 Matches with Friends
requirements.description: You need to play and complete a total of 250 matches in a group with friends.

name: Brothers in Arms III
description: Complete 50 matches while in a group with friends.

rewards.title: Team Player
rewards.extra: Unlock a badge for your team-focused gameplay and friendship.

tipsTricks.heading: Form a Consistent Group
tipsTricks.description: Try to form a consistent group of friends to play together regularly. This makes completing the mission easier.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay in Communication
tipsTricks.description: Use voice chat or text messages to communicate strategies and stay coordinated with your group.

tipsTricks.heading: Play in Group-Focused Modes
tipsTricks.description: Participate in group-based game modes such as squad matches to ensure all your team members are present for each match.

requirements.heading: Complete 50 Matches with Friends
requirements.description: Play and complete a total of 50 matches with your friends in a group.

name: Brothers in Arms II
description: Complete 10 matches while in a group with friends.

rewards.title: Social Squad
rewards.extra: A badge for completing group missions and being a reliable team player.

tipsTricks.heading: Play with Friends
tipsTricks.description: To make progress, invite your friends to join your squad and play together in each match.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose Squad Matches
tipsTricks.description: Participate in squad-based matches, which are perfect for completing group-based mission requirements.

tipsTricks.heading: Complete Quick Matches
tipsTricks.description: Complete short and quick matches with friends to earn progress without much time investment.

requirements.heading: Complete 10 Matches with Friends
requirements.description: Complete a total of 10 matches in a group with friends.

name: Brothers in Arms I
description: Complete 5 matches while in a group with friends.

rewards.title: Friendly Fighter
rewards.extra: A badge to show your teamwork and camaraderie.

tipsTricks.heading: Start with Friends
tipsTricks.description: Make sure to invite friends to form a squad before you start your matches. You can quickly progress by playing with others.

tipsTricks.heading: Opt for Short Matches
tipsTricks.description: To complete this quickly, opt for shorter matches like Team Deathmatch or other modes that don’t take long.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Voice Chat
tipsTricks.description: Communicate with your friends via voice chat for better coordination and quicker victories.

requirements.heading: Complete 5 Matches with Friends
requirements.description: Complete a total of 5 matches in a group with friends.

name: Riding Marksman
description: Defeat 10 players with weapons while traveling on a vehicle moving at 30km/h or faster.

rewards.title: Mobile Sharpshooter
rewards.extra: A badge to highlight your exceptional accuracy on the move.

tipsTricks.heading: Choose Stable Vehicles
tipsTricks.description: Opt for vehicles like the UAZ or Dacia that offer better stability when shooting on the move.

tipsTricks.heading: Use Automatic Weapons
tipsTricks.description: Weapons with high firing rates, such as SMGs or ARs, make it easier to hit targets while moving.

tipsTricks.heading: Drive in Open Areas
tipsTricks.description: Engage in combat in open areas to have better visibility and less obstruction while aiming at enemies.

tipsTricks.heading: Practice Weapon Control
tipsTricks.description: Spend time practicing recoil control and aiming while in motion to increase your accuracy.

requirements.heading: Defeat 10 Players While Traveling in a Vehicle
requirements.description: Eliminate 10 enemies using weapons while your vehicle maintains a speed of 30km/h or more.
